title: NHK The Battle of Karafuto 720p x264 AAC HDTV
description: The Battle of Karafuto War Documentary hosted by Rachel Walzer, published by NHK in 2017 - English narration. http://docuwiki.net/images/c/cc/The-Battle-of-Karafuto-Cover.jpg Information ------------------------------ A radio address by Emperor Showa on 15th August 1945 was supposed to mark Japan's exit from World War II. But for people in Karafuto, a Japanese territory on present-day Sakhalin, the war wasn't over. As Soviet troops advanced, local Japanese commanders got a puzzling order: "Defend Karafuto to the death". With military resources depleted, civilians were sent to confront heavily armed Soviet forces. Over 7 days, up to 6,000 people died. Through interviews with survivors, we explore this tragic chapter.
